summary: Implements an inverted residual block from MobileNetV2, consisting of an optional expansion via 1x1 convolution, a depthwise convolution with configurable stride, and a projection 1x1 convolution that restores the channel dimension. The block supports residual connections when input and output dimensions match and stride equals one.
business_intent: Provides a computationally efficient building unit for lightweight convolutional neural networks targeting mobile and edge devices, enabling fast image classification and feature extraction with reduced memory and power consumption.
